title: Firefox crash help/advice_ updated to new version_Firefox no longer opens_Windows 7 Pro
content:
Hi, Would like suggestions on how to make FireFox work again as it will not open now. Need to access urls with autofill login, security, etc. for business purposes on my laptop computer (this is my desktop computer).

support.mozilla does not seem to provide fixes/suggestion that are specific to my issue.

Background: - Firefox flaky on a couple of sites to autofill username and password login info - downloaded latest version of FireFox on 03.14.22 - selected install - firefox did not re-open, selected Firefox under Program Files and dialog box of file path not valid - restarted computer & Firefox no longer under Program Files - cannot open Firefox & no other Browser loaded onto computer - not able to attach crash file from folder of profileâ€¦. Firefox/Profiles/uj9452s7.default/crashes/store.json.mozlz4 - emails: 

               - kthompson@okensredx.com                - other/desktop computer, not laptop:  ken@aerationllc.com

Thanks for suggestions or urls which can guide me to success.

Ken
creator: kthompson4
